StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: Time at university was over. [PAUSE] Although unsure about what to do next, a gut feeling made clear that dropping by Professor Eucalyptus's office would yield something useful.
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Player

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: A job? In this economy? Archaeology degree.... Hmmmm.
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Professor Eucalyptus

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: Hmmmm. [PAUSE] Hmmmmmmmmmmmm...
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Professor Eucalyptus

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: I know! [PAUSE] The old museum... Yes! I have a job for you. But it will require grit, dedication and a lot of digging!
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Professor Eucalyptus

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: A museum?
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Player

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: Yes! The old museum in my town, where I used to work during the summers! It is a rundown dingy place nowadays. But the town is in need of some help, and few are willing to take on the task.
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Professor Eucalyptus

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: Alright, professor, I don't have a better idea. I'll take on the museum.
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Player

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: Good, good. Ever since I laid eyes on you in my class that year, I knew you had something special about you. Meet me at the _______ Bus Stop. I'll explain the rest when you get there. Oh, and be sure to pack enough stuff to stay for a while.
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Professor Eucalyptus

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: Alright. We're here.
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Player

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: Wonderful! The bus arrived right on time. It's good to see you [PLAYERNAME].
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Professor Eucalyptus

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: Come! Grab your things. Let me show you your new home! It's quite literally right around the corner!
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Professor Eucalyptus

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: So, I'm not going to lie to you. [PAUSE]. But, you'll have a good bit of work to do here.
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Professor Eucalyptus

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: Before I let you unpack and all. Let me give you a basic tour of the place.[TRIGGERTUTORIAL]
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Professor Eucalyptus

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: The place is quite small, but I think there is room for expansion. The entire strip of trees in the back there is owned by the museum! Which in turn is owned by the city council.
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Professor Eucalyptus

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: But, here. Let me get you started. Here's an old tomahawk my family has passed down for generations. It's said it was given to my great, great grandpa by a local Native American chief.
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Professor Eucalyptus

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: Now, let me see you put this in that old exhibit over there.
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Professor Eucalyptus

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: [TRIGGERTUTORIAL]
Good job!
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Professor Eucalyptus

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: There's a lot of cleaning, remodelling and of course, artifact-hunting to be done before this museum returns to its glory days.
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Professor Eucalyptus

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: Speaking of artifacts, a possible ancient battle site has been identified around these parts. And I've managed to secure a permit for you and the museum to go excavating there.
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Professor Eucalyptus

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: That's awesome! I can finally be a real archaeologist!
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Player

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: Hold your horses! You still need a digging assistant, and I, for one, am too busy with the university. See if someone in town is willing to help you out. Meanwhile, I'll get some dinner.
StorySceneEntries.Speaker: Professor Eucalyptus

StorySceneEntries.Dialogue: [TRIGGERTUTORIAL]
